title: FS: T-206 Charlie O'leary Back Set (Cycle, Hindu, Broadleaf, Blank Back, etc.) - SOLD
author: JP

posts.post_title: FS: T-206 Charlie O'leary Back Set (Cycle, Hindu, Broadleaf, Blank Back, etc.) - SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARDS ARE SOLD

Absolutely breaks my heart to sell this...and so soon after almost completing it.  :(  Thanks to everyone on Net54 who helped me assemble it.  I hope it goes to a good home.  Thanks to some unwelcome family drama, I'm having to raise some cash, and quick!  While baseball cards are a love of mine, in the end they are just a hobby and family must come first, so I'll be taking a hiatus for an indefinite amount of time.  C'est la vie!  This is my third and last ad I'm listing on the B/S/T, the rest will be sold on eBay in the coming weeks...I've got at least $5k into this set, but will take the first reasonable offer that comes along.  Please PM or e-mail to [url]jmpkcp@gmail.com[/url]

This back set is missing ONLY a very common version (Sweet Caporal 350 Factory 25)....so it should be easy to complete.  

Here's what I've got:

Blank Back (SGC Authentic)
Polar Bear (PSA 3)
Sweet Caporal 350 Factory 30 (PSA 4)
Tolstoi (PSA 5.5)
Cycle 460 (PSA 5)
Broad Leaf 460 (PSA 1.5)
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 25 (PSA 4)
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 (PSA 1)
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Overprint (SGC 50)
Red Hindu (PSA 1)
Old Mill (PSA 1)
El Principe De Gales (PSA 5)
Piedmont 350 Factory 25 (PSA 5)
Sovereign 350 (PSA 6)
Piedmont 350-460 Factory 25 (PSA 5 and PSA 6)
Piedmont 350-460 Factory 42 (Raw but I guarantee a numerical grade)

Good luck wit hthat. Ask Brian Daniels that if I had the monet , I would buy it as being known for multiple collecting.

NICE GROUP !
Great collection. Good luck with it.

hey jp-
very sorry to hear about your unexpected hiatus...
your passion for this hobby is appreciated & will be missed.
looking forward to seeing you back here again some time in the future.
thanks for YOUR help.
regards,
mark

JP

GOOD LUCK!!!

sorry to hear ...hope all works out....the new owner will definetly be happy!!i loved the pied 42, red hindu and the 460 broadleaf:) among the others..

PEACE

and may God be with you

Johnny V:)
